algorithm_technique: Greedy approach with QuickSelect (nth_element) to find optimal cheese assignments.
problem_summary_simple: Maximize mouse cheese rewards by assigning k cheeses to mouse 1.
problem_summary_technical: Maximize sum of rewards by assigning k items to mouse 1, using difference array and QuickSelect.
key_insights: The core idea is to maximize the difference (reward1[i] - reward2[i]) for the k cheeses mouse 1 eats.
By calculating the difference, we transform the problem into selecting the k largest differences.
QuickSelect (nth_element) efficiently finds the k-th largest difference in linear time.
